H0.text: Lent (Latin Quadragesima) is traditionally a Christian religious fast of how many days. 30

H1.text: Lent (Latin Quadragesima) is traditionally a Christian religious fast of how many days. 45

H2.text: Lent (Latin Quadragesima) is traditionally a Christian religious fast of how many days. 50

H3.text: Lent (Latin Quadragesima) is traditionally a Christian religious fast of how many days. 40

A4.text: Lent is described as lasting for a total duration of 40 days

A5.text: There are traditionally 40 days in Lent; these are marked by fasting, both from foods and festivities, and by other acts of penance
